metadata.title: CVE-2022-29909 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Documents in deeply-nested cross-origin browsing contexts could haveobtained permissions granted to the top-level origin, bypassing theexisting prompt and wrongfully inheriting the top-level permissions. Thisvulnerability affects Thunderbird < 91.9, Firefox ESR < 91.9, and Firefox <100.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
